title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated Copilot billing documentation for clarity and removed license reassignment references.
Changed Dependabot IP allow list instructions to use 'actions' key in meta API.
Generalized audit log event description for `api.request` across multiple GHES versions.
Made minor formatting updates to OpenAPI schema descriptions.
Enabled push protection for Pulumi API tokens in secret scanning.

- Enabled push protection for Pulumi API tokens in secret scanning.

Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
